mapper.sql: select car_id,asset_tag,borrow_end_date,borrow_start_date,tax,driving_license, car_group_id,driving_license_start_date,driving_license_end_date, dept_id,power_type, car_type_id, car_license,lock_state, state,license_price, car_type, seat_num,price, car_color, car_license_color,source, power_type, car_type, engine_number, engine_cc, engine_power, car_number, car_imgae_url, car_driving_license_images_url, car_license_image_url, buy_date, rent_end_date,rent_start_date, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from car_info
mapper.insert:
select last_insert_id();
insert into car_info
car_id, car_group_id, dept_id, company_id, car_type_id, car_license, state, seat_num, car_color, car_license_color, power_type, car_type, engine_number, engine_cc, engine_power, car_number, car_imgae_url, car_driving_license_images_url, car_license_image_url, buy_date, rent_end_date, owner_org_id, enterprise_car_type_id, rent_start_date, borrow_start_date, borrow_end_date, driving_license_end_date, driving_license_start_date, driving_license, tax, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, source, asset_tag, license_price, price, lock_state, company_id,
#{carId}, #{carGroupId}, #{deptId}, #{companyId}, #{carTypeId}, #{carLicense}, #{state}, #{seatNum}, #{carColor}, #{carLicenseColor}, #{powerType}, #{carType}, #{engineNumber}, #{engineCc}, #{enginePower}, #{carNumber}, #{carImgaeUrl}, #{carDrivingLicenseImagesUrl}, #{carLicenseImageUrl}, #{buyDate}, #{rentEndDate}, #{ownerOrgId}, #{enterpriseCarTypeId}, #{rentStartDate}, #{borrowStartDate}, #{borrowEndDate}, #{drivingLicenseEndDate}, #{drivingLicenseStartDate}, #{drivingLicense}, #{tax}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{source}, #{assetTag}, #{licensePrice}, #{price}, #{lockState}, #{companyId},
mapper.delete:
delete from car_info where car_id in
#{carId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from car_info where car_group_id = #{carGroupId} and state != 'S444'
select count(1) from car_info where state != 'S444' and company_id = #{companyId}

select dhi.longitude , dhi.latitude, ecti.`level`, c.car_type as carType, c.car_color as carColor, c.car_license as carLicense, o.state, o.order_number as orderNumber, o.order_id as orderId, o.driver_name as driverName, o.driver_mobile as driverMobile from car_info c left join order_info o on o.car_id=c.car_id left join ( select d1.* from driver_heartbeat_info d1, (select dd.driver_id,dd.order_id,max(dd.create_time) mtime from driver_heartbeat_info dd group by dd.driver_id,dd.order_id) d2 where d1.driver_id=d2.driver_id and d1.order_id=d2.order_id and d1.create_time=d2.mtime ) dhi on dhi.driver_id=o.driver_id and dhi.order_id=o.order_id left join enterprise_car_type_info ecti on ecti.car_type_id=c.car_type_id left join car_group_info cgi on cgi.car_group_id=c.car_group_id
o.state in( 'S500','S600','S616' ) and ecti.`level`= #{carLevel} and c.car_license like CONCAT('%',#{carLicense},'%') and c.power_type=#{powerType} and c.asset_tag like CONCAT('%',#{assetTag},'%') and c.source=#{carSource} and c.state=#{carState} and cgi.city=#{cityId}
select car_id from car_info where car_group_id = #{carGropuId} and state = 'S001'

select car.* from car_group_info cg LEFT JOIN car_info car on car.car_group_id=cg.car_group_id LEFT JOIN enterprise_car_type_info ect on ect.car_type_id=car.car_type_id
1=1 and cg.state='Y000' and car.state='S000' and car.lock_state='0000' AND car.car_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carTypeInfo},'%') AND car.seat_num>=#{passengers} AND cg.car_group_id=#{carGroupId} AND ect.car_group_id=#{carLevel}

select car.* from car_group_info cg LEFT JOIN car_info car on car.car_group_id=cg.car_group_id LEFT JOIN enterprise_car_type_info ect on ect.car_type_id=car.car_type_id
1=1 and cg.state='Y000' and car.state='S000' and car.lock_state='0000' AND car.car_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carTypeInfo},'%') AND car.car_license LIKE CONCAT('%',#{carLicense},'%') AND cg.car_group_id=#{carGroupId} AND car.seat_num>=#{passengers} AND ect.`level`=#{carLevel}
mapper.update: update car_info set state = 'S001' where car_id = #{carId}

update car_info set lock_state = '1111'
1=1 and lock_state='0000' and car_id=#{carId}

update car_info set lock_state = '0000'
1=1 and lock_state='1111' and car_id=#{carId}
mapper.select:
SELECT car_license AS carLicense, car_type AS carType, a.car_id as carId FROM car_info a WHERE car_group_id = #{carGroupId}
and car_id not in ( select car_id from driver_car_relation_info where driver_id=#{driverId} )
and car_license like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND state = 'S000'
mapper.update:
update car_info
state = #{state}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime},
where car_group_id = #{carGroupId} and state != 'S444'

update car_info
state = #{state}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime},
where car_id = #{carId} AND SYSDATE() <= IFNULL(rent_end_date,SYSDATE()) AND SYSDATE() <= IFNULL(borrow_end_date,SYSDATE()) AND SYSDATE() <= IFNULL(driving_license_end_date,SYSDATE()) AND state != 'S444'
mapper.select:
select car_id,car_license,car_type_id,car_type,#{date} date from car_info where state='S000' and car_group_id = #{carGroupId}
and (car_license like concat('%', #{search}, '%') or car_type like concat('%', #{search}, '%') )

select count(*) from car_info where state='S000' and car_group_id = #{carGroupId}
and (car_license like concat('%', #{search}, '%') or car_type like concat('%', #{search}, '%') )

select o.order_id orderId, o.state, o.service_type serviceType, jn.it_is_return itIsReturn, jn.charter_car_type charterCarType, DATE_FORMAT(s.action_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') orderStartTime, s.address startAddress, t.address endAddress, DATE_FORMAT(t.action_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') orderEndTime, eu.nick_name passengerName, eu.phonenumber passengerPhone, ci.car_color carColor, ci.car_license carLicense, cti.name carGrade, ci.car_type carType, (select state from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=o.order_id order by trace_id desc limit 1) labelState from order_info o left join journey_info jn on o.journey_id=jn.journey_id left join ecmp_user eu on o.user_id=eu.user_id left join car_info ci on o.car_id=ci.car_id left join enterprise_car_type_info cti on cti.car_type_id=ci.car_type_id left join order_address_info s on s.order_id=o.order_id and s.type='A000' left join order_address_info t on t.order_id=o.order_id and t.type='A999' where o.car_id=#{carId} AND DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT a.CITY_CODE cityId, a.city_name cityName, group_concat( DISTINCT b.car_group_id ) carGroupIds FROM china_city a inner JOIN car_group_serve_scope_info b ON b.city = a.CITY_CODE WHERE 1 =1
and b.car_group_id in
#{groupId}
GROUP BY a.CITY_CODE

select * from car_info where car_group_id in
#{id}
select total_mileage from order_settling_info where order_id=#{orderId}

select car_id carId,car_group_id carGroupId,car_type_id carTypeId,car_license carLicense from car_info WHERE state = "S000"
and car_license like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
